title: History’s Best Reincarnation - Novel Updates
tags: Male Protagonist   Parody   Reincarnation   Weak to Strong
author: That Touch Of Crimson   那一抹绯红
description:
A Door of Reincarnation that leads to ten thousand worlds!

The main god has died, Reincarnation is still active!

A sliver of a soul that unintentionally steps into the land of reincarnation!

For rebirth, for longevity, firmly deciding to open the Door of Reincarnation!

From now on, the heavens and all the worlds shall let me do as I please!>
